definition: capacity/quantity/amount/to estimate/abbr. for 量詞|量词[liang4 ci2], classifier (in Chinese grammar)/measure word

sentences.english: It's used for objects such as string constants and classes.
sentences.chinese: 它用於諸如字符串常量和類之類的對象。

sentences.english: Select the Constant Load from the drop-down list provided.
sentences.chinese: 從提供的下拉列表中選擇常量荷載名稱。

sentences.english: First step, constant, right? Nothing to do.
sentences.chinese: 第一步，常量對不對？什麼都沒做。

sentences.english: The base class also defines some simple constants for the names of the tags.
sentences.chinese: 基類還爲標記的名稱定義了一些簡單的常量。

sentences.english: Hexadecimal constants are commonly used as masks or specific bit values.
sentences.chinese: 進制的常量通常都用作掩碼或特殊位的值。

sentences.english: Standard constants and tools for placing an object within a potentially larger container.
sentences.chinese: 用於在可能更大的容器中放置對象的標準常量和工具。

sentences.english: The energy content of a diet depends upon its macronutrient composition.
sentences.chinese: 膳食的能量含量取決於其常量營養素組成。

sentences.english: As I change the scenario, I must edit these constants within the main script.
sentences.chinese: 在我更改方案時，我必須在主腳本內編輯這些常量。

sentences.english: Because class names are constants, you can have only one class of a given name.
sentences.chinese: 因爲類名稱是常量，所以您只能有一個給定名稱的類。

sentences.english: This constant defines the port on which the pullup resistor is connected.
sentences.chinese: 這個常量定義了上拉電阻是連接到哪個口的。

sentences.english: This paper outlines Carnot cycle efficiency of ideal gas whose heat capacity is a constant.
sentences.chinese: 概述了熱容量爲常量的理想氣體的卡諾循環效率。

sentences.english: Helical spring math models in the literature have constant pitch angle, which are not accurate enough.
sentences.chinese: 螺旋彈簧的動力學模型一般都假設沒螺旋角是常量。

sentences.english: Let me explain those three booleans a bit more.
sentences.chinese: 讓我們更詳細地解釋這三個布爾常量。

sentences.english: This constant φ is called the golden ratio.
sentences.chinese: 這個常量φ叫做黃金比例。

sentences.english: In the map file, you can also declare application constants.
sentences.chinese: 在映射文件中，您還可以聲明程序常量。

sentences.english: This article discussed the distribution of major and trace elements of peat in Yuanchi, Changbai Mountain.
sentences.chinese: 探討了長白山圓池泥炭常量和微量元素的分佈規律。

definition: (computing) actual parameter/argument/abbr. for 實際參數|实际参数[shi2 ji4 can1 shu4]
